// æ¥å—ä¸¤ä¸ªç±»å‹ç›¸åŒçš„å‚æ•°å¹¶äº¤æ¢å®ƒä»¬
func swapTwoValues<T>(_ a: inout T, _ b: inout T) {
    let temp = a
    a = b
    b = temp
}

var a = 10
var b = 20
swapTwoValues(&a, &b)
print(a) // æ‰“å°: 20
print(b) // æ‰“å°: 10

var c = "Hello"
var d = "World"
swapTwoValues(&c, &d)
print(c) // æ‰“å°: "World"
print(d) // æ‰“å°: "Hello"
